page.title: 08Life At Worksop College
page.content: Pupils get up at 7:25am and have breakfast between 7:35 and 8:25. They have prayers on Tuesday, Thursday and Friday mornings. After prayers they attend 5 morning lessons of 40 mins. each. On Monday, Tuesday and Friday there are two afternoon lessons. On Monday afternoon everyone takes part in Cadet Force activities. After Tuesday and Friday lessons internal games of a wide choice are held. The Thursday afternoon is occupied by activities, societies and hobbies. Wednesday and Saturday afternoons are free. Pupils spend nearly two hours studying on weekday evenings.During Winter 'Lights Out' is 9:45pm but is 10:30pm for the Summer. The Woodard Corp. aims to give "A good Christian education without large fees" so there is an emphasis on Church services.
